values.text: W I T H  Y O U R  K I D S !

Juneteenth is a time to celebrate the day that landmark civil rights legislation was signed. To honor this important occasion, we're having our pre-school activity tomorrow morning at 10am! Join in on activities such as silent art, Readers Theater and Drama Production with your child or even make them their favorite breakfast dish using eggs they'll be learning how cook soon enough too.

Home About Gallery Pages

CELEBRATE
JUNETEENTH

W I T H  Y O U R  K I D S !

Juneteenth is a time to celebrate the day that landmark civil rights legislation was signed. To honor this important occasion, we're having our pre-school activity tomorrow morning at 10am! Join in on activities such as silent art, Readers Theater and Drama Production with your child or even make them their favorite breakfast dish using eggs they'll be learning how cook soon enough too.
